# QC Results

```{r}
library(magrittr)

extraction_batch_source <- arrow::read_parquet(
  "../../data/processed/reference/extraction_batch_source.parquet"
)

quality_control_sample_adjustment <- arrow::read_parquet(
  "../../data/processed/reference/quality_control_blank_filter_adjustment.parquet"
)

qc_results <- arrow::read_parquet(
  "../../data/processed/build-data-products/blank_filtered_analyte_concentration_quality_control_no_recovery.parquet"
) %>% 
  dplyr::filter(batch_number == 2)
```

```{r}
qc_results %>% 
  dplyr::filter(individual_native_analyte_name == "PFBA")
```

# Eval QC Results

```{r}
eval_results <- arrow::read_parquet(
  "../../data/processed/build-data-products/blank_filtered_evaluated_qc_no_recovery.parquet"
) %>% 
  dplyr::filter(batch_number == 2)

eval_results %>% 
  # dplyr::filter(individual_native_analyte_name == "PFBA") %>% 
  dplyr::filter(evaluate_recovery_ratio_flag == "PASS") %>% 
  dplyr::select(-batch_number,-quality_control_exists_flag)
```
